Hongyi_the_electric

August 02, 2021

Hongyi Lin’s analysis on Tesla’s 4680 calendar aging problem was quoted by Steve LeVine in the Electric: The Bad News That Elon Musk Shared and Everybody Missed!

Our Group is primarily based in the Shanghai University Computer Engineering Science Department, with additional affiliations with Artificial Intelligence Institute.
